attributes.action: We believe the Government of UK should hold a petition on whether United Kingdom should remain in the European Union and be governed by European Laws.
attributes.additional_details:
We believe the government of UK should hold a petition on whether United Kingdom should remain in the European Union and be governed by European Laws, before the next General Elections, as they suggested in their manifesto.

If they do not we will definately not vote for them at the next General Elections.
